revised_title: Investigating the General Circulation of the Atmosphere in Middle and Higher Latitudes
tldr: This article investigates the general circulation of the atmosphere in middle and higher latitudes, focusing on the motion of air and pressure distribution. The author suggests that the motion of air in middle latitudes is more of a passage around the pole in a general easterly direction than previously thought. The study supports the existence of a general circulation of the atmosphere from west to east along middle latitudes, with deviations due to local weather systems.
